docs.title: Software Engineer | Cloud & DevOps Specialist
docs.text:
Welcome to my portfolio. I'm a cloud-native backend and DevOps engineer with over 5 years of experience building scalable, automated systems across AWS and GCP. I specialize in NestJS/Node.js backend services, Kubernetes orchestration, and infrastructure as code.

"Think lightly of yourself and deeply of the world." — Miyamoto Musashi, Vagabond

Explore my resume to see my work experience, check out my projects, or get in touch.

docs.title: Professional Profile
docs.text: Cloud-native Backend & DevOps Engineer with 5+ years of experience building scalable, automated, and secure systems across AWS and GCP. Specialized in designing high-performance backend services with NestJS/Node.js and orchestrating robust cloud infrastructure using Terraform, Kubernetes, Pulumi, and GitOps tooling. Proven track record implementing CI/CD pipelines, secure deployment workflows, and real-time applications powered by Firebase and serverless platforms. Strong advocate for DevSecOps, observability, and reliability engineering, ensuring highly available systems, reduced operational overhead, and rapid delivery cycles.

docs.title: Key Skills
docs.text:
Backend: NestJS, Node.js, TypeScript

Databases: SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Firestore

Cloud: GCP (Firebase, Cloud Functions), AWS

Automation & DevOps Tools: Scrum, JIRA, SonarQube, Nexus, Artifactory, Jenkins

Containers & Orchestration: Docker, Kubernetes, ArgoCD

Monitoring & Logs: Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack, Datadog, Splunk

MLOps: Model deployment (AWS/GCP), RAG pipelines, Vector databases, Model monitoring, Feature engineering automation

docs.title: Backend Engineer (NestJS) | AI & Cloud Engineer
docs.text:
AFRIZENITH | Jul 2025 - Nov 2025 | Remote

Afrizenith is a Nigerian technology company focused on building AI-driven products, cloud-native solutions, and scalable digital platforms for enterprise and consumer clients.

  • Developed and maintained robust backend systems using NestJS, powering multiple Afrizenith products across authentication, user management, content workflows, and AI integrations.
  • Designed cloud-native solutions leveraging GCP Firebase (Auth, Firestore, RTDB, Cloud Functions, Storage, FCM), resulting in a highly scalable, serverless-first architecture with minimal overhead.
  • Built real-time communication features, including instant chat and live collaboration, using Firebase’s RTDB and Firestore listeners, reducing message delivery latency by \~80% compared to prior implementations.
  • Engineered and deployed AI services on AWS including: Facial verification using AWS Rekognition, achieving fast, secure, and low-latency identity checks, Model deployment pipelines for inference endpoints using AWS Lambda/SageMaker.
  • Architected and implemented a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipeline powering Afrizenith’s AI chatbot using GPT models, improving answer accuracy and contextual relevance across knowledge bases.
  • Built and optimized API gateways, authentication flows, and secure data operations, improving backend performance by 40%.
  • Implemented CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices across Firebase, GCP, and AWS services, ensuring fully automated deployments and consistent environment parity.
  • Designed Firestore data models and indexes that reduced read/write costs by 30% while improving lookup speed for large collections.
  • Maintained end-to-end cloud infrastructure for AI and backend services, including monitoring, logging, and alerting across GCP and AWS.

  • Transitioned into MLOps, creating automated pipelines for dataset ingestion, feature extraction, model training, evaluation, and deployment — reducing ML iteration cycles by 60%.
  • Implemented CI/CD workflows for both backend and ML models using GitHub Actions/Jenkins, increasing deployment frequency by 3x with zero service disruption.
  • Containerized and deployed services on Docker + Kubernetes, achieving 99.8% uptime across multiple product environments.
  • Productionized multiple ML models (text classification, anomaly detection, compliance rule intelligence) used internally across Pavilion’s platform ecosystem.
  • Led troubleshooting efforts for complex infrastructure issues, resolving 90% of incidents within SLA and minimizing business disruption.
  • Led backend + AI troubleshooting efforts, resolving 90% of production incidents within SLA.
